thothbot.parallax.core.shared.lights

Class DirectionalLight

  • java.lang.Object
    • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.core.Object3D
      • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.lights.Light
        • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.lights.ShadowLight
          • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.lights.DirectionalLight
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasIntensity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VirtualLight

    public class DirectionalLight
extends ShadowLight
    Affects objects using MeshLambertMaterial or MeshPhongMaterial. 
     
 // White directional light at half intensity shining from the top. 
 
 DirectionalLight light = new DirectionalLight( 0xffffff, 0.5 ); 
 light.position.set( 0, 1, 0 ); 
 getScene().add( light );
    Author:
    thothbot
